title: Vogue Knitting Book
aka: Vogue's Book of Knitting and Crochet
additional-note: Early issues of this serial were renewed as books, numbered as editions.  The first to be renewed was 'Vogue's 3rd Book of Knitting and Crochet'.  The 4th-8th editions were renewed as 'Vogue's Knitting Book', the 9th and later as 'Vogue Knitting Book'.  From the Spring-Summer 1950 issue onward, Vogue Knitting Book was renewed as a periodical.
